Webinars and videos

 Free your data (and your mind will follow)

As many parts of the world continue to endure life in lockdown, the maritime events business has become a case of ‘another week, another podcast’.

 Time out, but no time off

The current crisis continues to provide a daily test of the resourcefulness of the maritime supply chain.

 DHL experiencing delays to specific destinations due to COVID-19 #Update 2

Our global purchasing team are working closely with all our suppliers on a daily basis
